name: CKEDITOR.htmlParser
doc:
Provides an "event like" system to parse strings of HTML data.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
parser.onTagOpen = function( tagName, attributes, selfClosing ) {
    alert( tagName );
};
parser.parse( '<p>Some <b>text</b>.</p>' ); // Alerts 'p', 'b'.

members.name: onCDATA
members.doc:
Function to be fired when CDATA section is found. This function should be overriden when using this class.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
parser.onCDATA = function( cdata ) {
    alert( cdata ); // 'var hello;'
} );
parser.parse( '<script>var hello;</script>' );
members.short_doc: Function to be fired when CDATA section is found. ...

members.name: onComment
members.doc:
Function to be fired when a commend is found. This function should be overriden when using this class.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
parser.onComment = function( comment ) {
    alert( comment ); // ' Example '
} );
parser.parse( '<!-- Example --><b>Hello</b>' );
members.short_doc: Function to be fired when a commend is found. ...

members.name: onTagClose
members.doc:
Function to be fired when a tag closer is found. This function should be overriden when using this class.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
parser.onTagClose = function( tagName ) {
    alert( tagName ); // 'b'
} );
parser.parse( '<!-- Example --><b>Hello</b>' );

params.name: tagName
params.doc: The tag name. The name is guarantted to be lowercased.

members.short_doc: Function to be fired when a tag closer is found. ...

members.name: onTagOpen
members.doc:
Function to be fired when a tag opener is found. This function should be overriden when using this class.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
parser.onTagOpen = function( tagName, attributes, selfClosing ) {
    alert( tagName ); // e.g. 'b'
} );
parser.parse( '<!-- Example --><b>Hello</b>' );

params.name: tagName
params.doc: The tag name. The name is guarantted to be lowercased.

params.name: attributes
params.doc: An object containing all tag attributes. Each property in this object represent and attribute name and its value is the attribute value.

params.name: selfClosing
params.doc: true if the tag closes itself, false if the tag doesn't.

members.short_doc: Function to be fired when a tag opener is found. ...

members.name: onText
members.doc:
Function to be fired when text is found. This function should be overriden when using this class.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
parser.onText = function( text ) {
    alert( text ); // 'Hello'
} );
parser.parse( '<!-- Example --><b>Hello</b>' );
members.short_doc: Function to be fired when text is found. ...

members.name: parse
members.doc:
Parses text, looking for HTML tokens, like tag openers or closers, or comments. This function fires the onTagOpen, onTagClose, onText and onComment function during its execution.

var parser = new CKEDITOR.htmlParser();
// The onTagOpen, onTagClose, onText and onComment should be overriden
// at this point.
parser.parse( '<!-- Example --><b>Hello</b>' );
members.short_doc:
Parses text, looking for HTML tokens, like tag openers or closers,
or comments. ...

short_doc: Provides an "event like" system to parse strings of HTML data. ...
